mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, user_name, password, real_name, phone, avatar, create_time, create_by) values (#{id}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{phone}, #{avatar}, NOW(), #{createBy})
mapper.select: select * from sys_user where del_flag=0 and user_name=#{userName} limit 1
select * from sys_user where del_flag=0 and phone=#{phone} limit 1
